data.name: SUSPENSE
data.detailed_description:
SUSPENSE is pretty hard and crazy first person game. One mistake and you have lot, all you have to do is to reach an exit. But no matter how easy it may seem, you will lose. Reach till the end and don't die from bunny with minigun, from falling piano or from flying jetpack cow.
You need to play around 1319325+ times in order to complete this game.
If you always wanted to destroy your pc with your bare hands, then Welcome to SUSPENSE !!!








SUSPENSE is a completely stupid and hard game. We advice to put your hammer, chainsaw and lasergun somewhere distant from your pc, but you probably don't have any laserguns pew-pew-pew.

Reach till the end and don't die from bunny with minigun, from falling piano or from flying jetpack cow.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German*, Russian*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 - (64/32) bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-550 / Phenom II X4 955 1.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 / Radeon HD 5770 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 - 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2600K / AMD FX-8350 2.1 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 | AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 +
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 750M / Intel Iris Pro 5200 / Radeon HD 3xxx
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 +
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB NVIDIA GTX 460 / ATI Radeon HD 6850
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12 +, Steam OS
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 750M / 9800GTX / Radeon HD 3xxx. OpenGL 3.2+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14, Steam OS
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB NVIDIA GTX 460 / ATI Radeon HD 6850. OpenGL 4.x+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
